Name: Bunny Ribbit
About the game: Bunny Ribbit is a tough-as-nails puzzle platformer about a toad and a rabbit on a quest to board Noah's ark. Traverse wacky worlds as you escape the ravaging flood and its rising waters. Teamwork will provide creative solutions to the challenges presented by stages in this retro-style homage to games of past. Features: Retro-style graphics and gameplay Linear level progression Multiple items and powerups Various collectables Multiple endings Mechanics Run Jump Fly - Fly on your own or lift your froggy pal high into the air Roll - Ride upon the toad as if he were a log or let him roll into enemies on his own Try to collect as much as possible to unlock the true ending!
Meta Title: Bunny Ribbit: Feb 15, 2021, OBRA and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Bunny Ribbit? Check out the release date (Feb 15, 2021), developer insights from OBRA, and a complete game summary.
